::Cutthroat/Skullgrin/Triggerhappy::

Cutthroat: Alright, Cutthroat find squad leader, Cutthroat go to Azores
Islands.

With that, Cutthroat transformed to creature mode again and flew off to
Azores Islands.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Skullgrin and Triggerhappy nodded.

     "Ya boss, sure thing," Triggerhappy said.

     Triggerhappy and Skullgrin spat one last time on Slaughter's remains,
and then went to the control room.
